text: 9|122|Arau muminasakale sakalorae ekelage abhiyanata oloraa ucita nahaya. Eteke sihamtara pratyeka dalara ekansa'i kiya nolaya, yate sihamte dbinara gabhira jnana arjana karaiba parae, arau yetiya sihamte nija sampradayara ocarata ubhati ahiba tetiya sihamtara sampradayaka bhitipradarsana karaiba parae, yate sihamte satarka haya.
